thread.section_title: NOW FINANCE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NOW FINANCE | www.nowfinance.com.au
thread.title: Sue Davidson
thread.title_full: NOW FINANCE reviewed by Sue Davidson

author: Sue Davidson
title: Sue Davidson
text:
Christina was amazing and so helpful from the start to the end of obtaining my loan. I'm sure I asked a lot of silly questions, but she never made me feel that they were at all.
Jason also was very helpful with the final signing of paperwork. I emailed him late one night not expecting an answer until the next day, but had one within minutes.
Michael called once settlement was ready to take place to ensure I was happy with everything and understood it all and to see if I had any questions.
Highly recommend NOW Finance and these wonderful people.
